abstract.t: Flow selection is the process of selecting a subset of Flows from all observed Flows. The Intermediate Flow Selection Process may be located at an IPFIX Exporter, Collector, or within an IPFIX Mediator. Flow selection reduces the effort of post-processing Flow data and transferring Flow Records. This document describes motivations for Flow selection and presents Flow selection techniques. It provides an information model for configuring Flow selection techniques and discusses what information about an Intermediate Flow Selection Process should be exported.
